data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 5, Josue Gomez Del Rosal (Pachuca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 7, Pachuca to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Leonardo Ramos for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 8, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Pachuca.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca's Roberto Nurse breaks free at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in Necaxa.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Necaxa.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Necaxa are in shooting range from this free kick.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daniel Alonso Aceves Pati√±o is on a sub for Josue Gomez Del Rosal for Pachuca.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 25, Pachuca's Roberto Nurse misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Pachuca de Soto, Cristian Souza of Pachuca is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Alex Zendejas (Necaxa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In the minute 35, Necaxa are coming forward and Alex Zendejas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 37, In Pachuca de Soto, Mario De Luna (Necaxa) misses the target with a header.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Roberto Nurse's header is off-target for Pachuca.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Pachuca push forward at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo and Antonio Figueroa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Necaxa defence.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 41, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 42, Throw-in high up the field for Necaxa in Pachuca de Soto.
Necaxa are pushing forward but Lucas Passerini's finish is wide of the goal.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick Necaxa.
The first-half is over at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Kevin Ortega is booked for the home team.
In the minute 46, Eduardo Galvan Basulto has blown to start the second-half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Necaxa throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Necaxa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 50, Necaxa pushes forward through Alex Zendejas, whose finish on goal is saved.
Necaxa's Mario De Luna gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Juan Delgado of Necaxa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 54, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 56, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team replace Leonardo Ramos with Felipe Pardo.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Pachuca.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Maximiliano Salas is replacing Lucas Passerini for Necaxa at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Claudio Baeza is replacing Fernando Arce for the away team.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, Pachuca to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 67, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Necaxa throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Pachuca are pushing forward but Efrain Orona's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Pachuca.
Antonio Figueroa (Pachuca) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Pachuca.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Efrain Orona (Pachuca) strikes at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo but his header is cleared.
In the minute 70, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca push forward at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo and Efrain Orona gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Necaxa defence.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Pachuca to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Necaxa.
Unai Bilbao (Necaxa) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Pachuca make their third substitution with Luis Calzadilla replacing Antonio Figueroa.
The home team replace Kevin Ortega with Rene Lopez Aburto.
In the minute 79, The home team have replaced Roberto Nurse with Eduardo Mustre Torres. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paulo Pezzolano.
Jose Guadalupe Cruz Nunez (Necaxa) is making a third substitution, with Martin Barragan replacing Juan Delgado.
Necaxa's Claudio Baeza has been booked in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 83, Can Pachuca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Necaxa's half?
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 85, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Necaxa throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa.
In Pachuca de Soto, Julio Gonzalez (Necaxa) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 87, Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa just outside Pachuca's area.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Necaxa.
Pachuca are coming forward and Luis Calzadilla gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Throw-in for Necaxa close to the penalty box.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Goal! Necaxa have got their heads in front thanks to a David Cabrera strike.
Oscar Murillo (Pachuca) has received a first yellow card.
Jose Guadalupe Cruz Nunez is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Jair Pereira replacing Ian Gonzalez.
